title: Key of Min Value
description: In this lab, you will learn how to find the key of the minimum value in a Python dictionary using the built-in `min()` function with the `key` parameter set to `dict.get()`.

meta.title: Key of Min Value in Python Dictionaries
meta.description: Learn how to find the key of the minimum value in a Python dictionary using a simple function.
meta.keywords: key, python, dictionary, min value, programming

verify.name: Verify Key of Minimum Value
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
